name: Rally Racer Speedrun
description:
Hello Guys!

This is Rally Racer Speedrun a free downloadable game for Windows. This game is from the series Rally Racer. This game is in HTML Format because I made this game in Scratch and converted it to HTML using HTMLifier because I could not convert it to EXE 😅. 

CONTROLS

Use arrow keys to control the car

VISIT
